attributes.action: make everyone pay a one of fee of £50 for a colour tv licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make everyone pay a fee of £50.00 for a tv licence this would cut the number of people who couldnt afford a licence im sure most people can afford to pay a one of fee of £50 they must pay this if they get taken to court for not having a tv licence, even the pensioners can now afford this fee
